tool_description: Kin Lane's list of tools for API deployment.  What can I say?  He's da man!
name: APIEvangelist
title: APIEvangelist

api_list.name: Deployment Tools
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ismaelc-apievangelist.p.rapidapi.com/data/tools.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ismaelc-apievangelist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ismaelc-apievangelist.p.rapidapi.com/data/tools.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ismaelc-apievangelist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
